Deep Q Network.

build_algorithm()[source]¶

Build algorithms using prebuilt networks.

build_network()[source]¶

Build tensorflow operations for algorithms.

get_action(obs)[source]¶

Get action according to the given observation and epsilon-greedy method.

Args:
obs: observation. The shape needs to be [None, dim_observation].
update(minibatch, update_ratio: float)[source]¶

更新策略，使用minibatch样本。 :param minibatch: A minibatch of samples. :update ratio: the ratio of update.
